subject: DRAGON TIME
event: [first posted at 9 am EST on my website] No. Sorry. Not done yet. I'm close, though. Watch this space. When the book is done, you will read it here. original cover 2006 Meanwhile... there is news. Big news. The end is in sight, at long long last, and we're close enough so that my editors and publishers at Bantam Spectra have set an actual publication date. revised cover 2007 A DANCE WITH DRAGONS will be in your favorite bookstore on TUESDAY, JULY 12, 2011 new cover 2009 Yes, I know. You've all seen publication dates before: dates in 2007, 2008, 2009. None of those were ever hard dates, however. Most of them... well, call it wishful thinking, boundless optimism, cockeyed dreams, honest mistakes, whatever you like. This date is different. This date is real. Barring tsunamis, general strikes, world wars, or asteroid strikes, you will have the novel in your hands on July 12. I hope you like it. ((For what it's worth, the book's a monster. Think A STORM OF SWORDS)) final cover? 2011 The dragons are coming. Prepare to dance. And hey... thanks for waiting.

props.taglist: song of ice and fire, bantam spectra, dance with dragons

comments.article: Four months until Dance, four books to reread. Thanks for making it fit so neatly. :D

Excellent!

I love the final? cover.
comments.subject: Yay

comments.article: Woo! THIS YEAR! :D

Green Spiral cover is the best.  Anyway, am I the only one who thinks that GRRM may have rushed this one?  Heh.  Just kidding.  Now get cracking on the next one.  I don't want to be reading it in 6 years.  I might be dead by then.

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!

That is all. I love the cover!
Hurrah! Brilliant timing. Just in time for my maternity leave. I hope there will be a Kindle edition??
Well worth the wait. It will be a joy. Thanks for not giving up on yourself either!
comments.subject: <3

I didn't finish the rest of the books too long ago, this will be the perfect way to spend my summer, right after watching the series!

Can't wait!

Oh, and GRRM? Haters gonna hate. They'll come back - they won't be able to resist your new book.

comments.subject: Waiting to read CROWS

comments.article:
Oh, frabjous day! Callooh! Callay!
We are all chortling in our joy...
I am sooo ready to see what Jon and Tyrion and Dany have been up to for the last 11 years (our time, that is)..
During the summer, too. Perfect. I know what I'll be reading pool-side this year!

I knew 2011 was going to be a good year.

My first skiing holiday, Portal 2 coming out, A Game of Thrones on TV and now this. WOO!

thanks for writing Mr. Martin.

can't wait to read

2011 will be a good year.

Last Malazan Book ( I'd make a joke about releasing books, but i'm in too good of a mood)
-A Game of Thrones
-Dance
-Mass Effect 3 and a bunch of other great RPGs
Congrats, thank you, general glee!

Thank you SO much, George! Best news of the year! It's going to be a very Dragon-ish summer, and I simply can't wait. Wait, yes I can. I'd rather wait another year and get a book that I know GRRM is happy with, than anything else. And, a monster tome at that.

So, the next question is... will you be coming to North Carolina to sign my copy? >8)
comments.subject: YES!!

comments.article: Huzzzzaaaahhhhhhh!!!!! what a good day.

You've kept us in suspense for 5.75 years. And I have to say, this is the best early Yule present I've ever seen.

You can do it!

oh my goodness, this is definitely welcome news, especially since i sit home with a sick 18 month old.  what a pick-me-up!  glad i re-read the series once again in prep for the tv series so i don't have to re-read them again for the book.  although i have a feeling i may end up doing it anyway.
EEEEEEEEEEEEe!!!!
